Episodes.Title: Follow That Flour
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is jealous when James gets to take some flour to the Harvest Festival and decides to hide the truck. However, a door opens and the flour leaks everywhere. Thomas is upset and goes to get a new truck, but the only full truck left is at the back of a siding and James has to help.

Episodes.Title: A Smooth Ride
Episodes.Plot: Sir Handel arrives at the Transfer Yards after working all summer at the stone quarry. Mr. Percival tells him to take apples from the orchard to the middle station and give a smooth ride. Sir Handel collects the trucks and starts his journey for the middle station.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Jet Plane
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy the jet plane tells Thomas how wonderful it is to fly and Thomas begins to think that it would be better to be a plane than a steam engine.

Episodes.Title: Percy at the Funfair
Episodes.Plot: When a funfair comes to the island, all the engines get to be a part of it, except for Percy who must pull coal around.

Episodes.Title: Emily And The Special Coaches
Episodes.Plot: Gordon has broken a speed record for pulling the Express and Emily is to collect some special coaches to honour his achievement.

Episodes.Title: Duncan Drops a Clanger
Episodes.Plot: It is the day of the Mountain Village Country Fair and all of the narrow gauge engines are busy with their various deliveries. Duncan is on his way to the Transfer Yards to collect the clock tower's bell that is to be polished when he comes across a bumpy stretch of track.

Episodes.Title: Thomas's Tricky Tree
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is sent to the Wharf to collect a Christmas tree from Sir Handle, but he is not exactly sure what he is looking for.

Episodes.Title: Toby's Afternoon Off
Episodes.Plot: Toby has finished all of his jobs and is looking forward to visiting the farm when the Fat Controller asks him to do some odd jobs. Toby's first job is to shunt some trucks. He asks Mavis for help, but she's too busy. Then Toby has to take some trucks to the depot. He asks Thomas for assistance, but

Episodes.Title: It's Good to Be Gordon
Episodes.Plot: Gordon needs to pull the express one more time to set a record and is determined not to let anything stand in his way.

Episodes.Title: Topped off Thomas
Episodes.Plot: As Thomas races Spencer, he blows the Fat Controller's top hat away. To make up for it, he tries to chase the wind as it carries it across the Island
